ing: 1 (6 ounce) package smoked chicken breast, skin removed, cubed
1/4 cup fresh basil leaves, cut into thin strips
des: "This is a delicious smoked chicken salad with almonds and fresh basil. Serve it over lettuce or on a sandwich."
ins: In a large bowl, combine the smoked chicken, grapes, red onion, celery, basil, almonds, and mayonnaise. Mix well; chill and serve.
